description: This file defines the layout component and other UI components for the Next.js ecommerce frontend, including site metadata, header, and footer components, rendering the main page layout with navigation and site info.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Main layout component that wraps all pages, providing a consistent header, footer, and background style.

methods.name: Header
methods.description: Component rendering the navigation bar with links and brand logo.

methods.name: SiteFooter
methods.description: Component rendering the website footer with site info and links.
